Dating: EARLY DYNASTIC PERIOD/THINITE PERIOD (not before); 1ST DYNASTY ?; EARLY DYNASTIC PERIOD/THINITE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Plate
Description: This large plate of limestone is distinguished by its very neat finish and its very beautiful polishing. It served  in the presention of the food set out in the tombs. The piece, which dates from the beginning of the Dynastic Period, comes from the excavations of E. Amelineau carried out at Abydos in 1895-1898.
